Uniform Law:

This section is based on ยง 204 of the Uniform Limited Company Act (2006 Act). See Vol. 6B , Uniform Laws Annotated, Master Edition or ULA Database on Westlaw.

DC CODE ยง 29-802.04

Current through December 11, 2012

sections.text: If a person required by this chapter to sign a record or deliver a record to the Mayor for filing under this chapter does not do so, any other person that is aggrieved may petition the Superior Court to order:
The person to sign the record;
The person to deliver the record to the Mayor for filing; or
The Mayor to file the record unsigned.

If a petitioner under subsection (a) of this section is not the limited liability company or foreign limited liability company to which the record pertains, the petitioner shall make the company a party to the action.

subchapter.text: Formation; Certificate of Organization, and Other Filings.

heading.catch_text: Signing and filing pursuant to judicial order.
